description:
Luffy, Sanji, and Usopp tangle with Satori and his exploding, snake-filled Surprise Clouds. The sky priest may look like a dancing dango, but the impact of his mantra leaves the pirates bloodied and boatless.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 10% Survival Rate! Satori, the Mantra Master!
Chances de survie : 10% ! Le prélat Satori et le pouvoir du Mantra !
Шанс выживания 10%! Жрец Сатори и сила мантры!
โอกาสรอด10%! ผู้คุ้มกฎผู้อ่านใจ ซาโตริ!
生存率10%! 心綱[マントラ]使いの神官サトリ!
